label: TradeLocation
comment: A physical location or place used or referenced for trade purposes.

datatypeProperties.comment: The unique identifier of a country location used or referenced in trade.
The name, expressed as text, of a country location used or referenced in trade.
The unique identifier for this location used or referenced in trade.
The name, expressed as text, of this location used or referenced in trade.

referencedBy.comment: A delivery location for this trade price.
A location where this trade tax is applicable.
The trade location relevant for these trade delivery terms.
